short_summary: Janitorial services of armouries - St-Hyacinthe and Drummondville
description: All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted at the latest by 2 PM EDT on May 30, 2023. All bids submitted after 2 PM EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. PWGSC, on behalf of the Department of National Defence is issuing this request for proposal (RFP) for the janitorial services at the St-Hyacinthe and Drummonville armories (Quebec, Canada). All details related to the requirement are found in the solicitation.
tags: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Project Details
..............................................................

* **Title:** W6893-22EMJ6 - Janitorial Services of Armouries - St-Hyacinthe and Drummondville
* **Reference Number:** WS3762642426
* **Amendment Number:** 7
* **Publication Date:** April 4, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** May 30, 2023 (14:00 HAE)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** May 1, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** February 1, 2025

#### Service Description
Janitorial services for armouries in St-Hyacinthe and Drummondville, Quebec, are required by the Department of National Defence.

#### Contact Information
.............................................................
* *Annabelle Cloutier*, SPAC/PSPC, [annabelle.cloutier@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:annabelle.cloutier@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) (elle-la / she-her)

#### Documents
The required supporting documentation and bid submission must be received by May 30, 2023 (14:00 HAE) at the latest. Bids received after this date and time will be considered non-responsive.

#### Invitation Details
This file contains the request for proposal (RFP) for the janitorial services at the St-Hyacinthe and Drummondville armories (Québec, Canada). All details related to the requirement are found within this solicitation.

#### Solicitation Documents
* ### Procurement Type
  Competitive, Open Invitation to Bid
* ### Evaluation Criteria
  Lowest Price
* ### Trade Agreements
  The procurement is subject to the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
  Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
  Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA) 
  Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
  Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
  Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
  Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
  Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
  North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
  Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
  Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
  Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
  Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

The above
